entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 2:47 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -12.9°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
